Description:
We're seeking motivated Real Estate Agents to join our team and play a pivotal role in selling and renting our diverse portfolio of properties, including apartments, villas, plots, and more. Whether you're an experienced realtor or new to the field, we offer an opportunity to thrive in a supportive environment.Responsibilities:Actively market and promote our properties for sale and rent.
Collaborate with potential buyers and tenants to understand their needs and preferences.
Conduct property viewings and guide clients through the buying or renting process.
Provide accurate and up-to-date property information to clients.
Negotiate offers and contracts to facilitate successful transactions.
Maintain strong relationships with clients to ensure their real estate needs are met.What We Offer:Comprehensive training to enhance your real estate knowledge and skills.
Unlimited property listings on prominent real estate portals to maximize exposure.
Visa and insurance coverage for added security and peace of mind.
Competitive 50 percent commission structure.
A supportive team environment that values collaboration and growth.Skills
Skills:
Passion for real estate and a desire to excel in the industry.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Proactive attitude and ability to work independently.
A strong drive to deliver exceptional customer service.
Experience in real estate is preferred but not mandatory.

If you're ready to take your real estate career to new heights and enjoy the benefits of a supportive and rewarding environment, we encourage you to apply. Join us in connecting clients with their dream properties and making a positive impact in the world of real estate
